title: Alert
content:
n

You gain a +5 bonus to Initiative and can't be Surprised.

How to unlock Alert

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Alert

All Classes at Level 4

Alert Tips & Notes

Given how initiative works in BG3 (roll d4 as opposed to d20 in D&D5e), the Alert feat will virtually guarantee a character to go first in the initiative order in combat.
